post.body: - UChicago = what's the scent of nerd?
- Congrats!
- re: "having only 1 or 2 people" Nice. Do you have a link I can show my boss?
- what a terrible, terrible idea. :-)
- my first time visiting the Resters' ancestral homeland (grandfather from baton rouge)
- dossier?
@ajschwab - here's the band I was told to go see tonight: http://www.jazzvipers.com/gigs.html
- ha, that *would* be sweet.
- nope. the multisite thing was way too techy for me, I need some theory. :-)
- you should probably thank Google for that. :-)
- had some absinthe the other night. Maybe a Ramos fizz (egg whites, gin, bitters, orange flower water, and soda water) 2night?
- going to send out a reminder?
- snow all gone now. Back to the 50s today, back to the 70s after I leave. :-(
- @uwebd Drupal group: http://cuwebd.ning.com/group/drupal
- thanx. Weird, in my exp. usually things that work in Firefox work fine in Safari. Any idea why that might be?
- I don't want to be rude by talking (out loud) during a presentation. :-)
- Patrick Kelly... didn't he play 2B for the Yankees back in the early 90s?
- planning on coming in Saturday, think we might be able to sneak in... just there for a week.
- lol, definitely. BTW, if the Hudson Valley could hold off the snow for my drive back to Kingston, I'd appreciate it. :-)
- oh, and who knows, you might get to see @lostcartgrphers play, too. ;-)
... Milennium Park, Venetian Night, the Botanic Gardens, etc. Boring. :-)
- yeah, there's nothing to do here in july. Just games at Wrigley/Sox, outdoor music festivals, film festival...
-- yeah, just stick around Chicago for the week. My wife and I'll show you the town. :-)
- ain't that the truth.
- I'm available. For a price.
- did you know @sashafrerejones is on Twitter?
- thanks for the follow. Keep up the good work on the Freelance Radio podcast!
- I just caught Ingrid Lucia in New Orleans a couple weeks ago; good stuff!
thanks for the follow. I see you're enjoying the Blago saga too. BTW my former @lostcartgrphers bandmate is now a student at UW Biz.
is one funny nerfherder.
- that was fast! Thanks!
- awesome. would you mind (when you have a chance) swapping the screenshot on @edustyle? thanks!
Lane Becker - make community experience seamful not seamless #diwd
Chicago, you can have ur weather r back now. kthxbai
Breaking into the $6 bottled water. Worth it to not have to go back out in the rain.
View from #diwd http://twitpic.com/rs1r
Oh dear. Just realized there are a CRAPLOAD of updates I need to install on my Drupal site. Where is my webmonkey?
Wifi dying... #diwd
"...is like handing someone a set of encyclopedias and asking them to proof-read it by lunch." (RT @fienen)
RT @fienen "Having only 1 or 2 people to manage your website..."
Just found out a friend got hired in UChicago's Communications department. Sweet!
Always forget about the schwag bag, and wind up lugging around two bags all day. Nice mug in this one, though. #diwd08
If you have a lousy cover band and want to get paid, NOLA seems like the place to be. Anyone know where to go for music that doesn't suck?
Wow, Bourbon St. is effing insane.
Weird to hear "Silver Bells" in a restaurant that has all its windows and doors wide open...
Abita turbodog (dark brown ale) = yum
Mets get K-Rod? Woo!
Plane at the gate at ohare. But no jetway driver.
Headed to the airport. It's been fun NOLA. #diwd
Sitting in Jackson square waiting for the tourist shops to open. It's Christmas shoppin' time.
#diwd One of @brianoberkirch 's friends requires commenter to check "I promise to be constructive, insightful and kind" before post
#dwid @brianoberkirch - can you give a soundbite (tweetable) definition of "user generated context"?
And the Fail Whale appears. #diwd
#diwd - are there existing Drupal modules for dealing with hCard?
Any tweeps using Glue? http://www.getglue.com/
Ahh, dry feet FTW!
RT @bobbybaird Why no controversy over the inaugural poet? she said "Poetry is what you find in the dirt in the corner": a patent falsehood.
Srsly Word, if u really want to be my default web page editor, maybe u should provide the option of measurements in px instead of inches.
hahahahahahahaah...Word just asked me if I want to make it my default web page editor... hahahahahahahahahah. <whew>
Why the eff doesn't Word's HTML rendering engine recognize background images?
RT @dickieadams - check out http://www.robotoys.com/
Backhoe 20 feet outside my window (and 4 feet above my head) trying to dig hole in very frozen ground. Feel the vibration!
RT @rohitbhargava - New blog post: The 5 Stages Of Twitter Acceptance http://twurl.nl/hdtyhv
http://twitpic.com/tmbp - Likely the world's most expensive pie.
The icons for Excel 2003 and Excel 2007 are almost indistinguishable from each other. Thanks, again Microsoft.
UChicago tweeps, please welcome @ibirkner , Senior Associate Director, Alumni Education. No I don't know what that means either.
Was kind of sad that @boagworld didn't reply to my attempt to Marcus-roll him. Then realized I @'ed him in the middle of the night in Engld
Amitabh HAS to play Doc Brown. But instead of being chased by the terrotists, he'd just lay some DISHOOM on them.
Doc, this is heavy! RT @joemillerjd Bollywood is Remaking Back to the Future http://ff.im/-s59N
Just Downloaded: Belle and Sebastian - Dear Catastrophe Waitress http://tinyurl.com/7qzwqj
OMFG! RSS Feeds for individual buses! Almost makes me wish I still took public transit to work. Almost.
Wow! The CTA's new website is... functional! And doesn't hurt my eyes! http://www.transitchicago.com
Finally getting around to updating our Drupal site from 6.2 to 6.8. Missed a couple apparently...
BTW while on the subject of politics: how bad is Blago? When I was in NOLA, even Louisianans were making fun of Illinois. #blago
I think the word I'm looking for to describe Gonzo = toolbox.
Wow RT @artduszynski - Alberto Gonzales - "I consider myself a casualty, one of the many casualties of the war on terror" http://is.gd/ehiQ
Wow, Pete Townshend's nose should never be photographed with a fisheye lens.
Was hoping this http://tinyurl.com/7rkkh5 was a typo and Blago had named Plaxico Burress to Senate. Now that would take testicular fortitude
Headed to lunch; would any Safari users out there mind checking out http://tinyurl.com/3qt8ep in the meantime? kthxbai
Think I finally fixed the problem in Safari on http://tinyurl.com/3qt8ep IE conditional comments FTW!
